title: By the King, a proclamation for continuing the collection of the customs and subsidies of tonnage and poundage
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, deceas'd, and by Henry Hills and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the ninth day of February, in the first year of our reign".
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
